#   Stripe API
#   
#   Stripe is a payment service provider that enables merchants to accept
#   credit cards, debit cards, and other forms of payment. Its Stripe
#   Payments solution is optimized for businesses that conduct most of
#   their sales online, with features specifically designed for e-commerce
#   transactions.
#   
#   The Stripe REST API allows developers to integrate Stripe payment
#   functionalities directly into their applications and services.
#   
#   Service URL:
#       https://api.stripe.com
